title: Applied Industry Project I
description: Initiation, completion and presentation of an individual project, involving research, allowing an opportunity to apply knowledge, skills, and competencies to address a significant business issue in the field of industrial technology, preferably in connection with the student's employment. As part of ITÂ 591 a formal written project proposal must be accepted and approved by the Industrial Technology Area Chair before work begins.
prerequisites: OCOB graduate standing or approval from the Associate Dean
